short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your tasks on your new tab page. Use nested tasks to transform your complex life into simple chunks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tatask helps you create a hierarchical tree of tasks so you can break down the biggest projects into manageable tasks.

The smaller your tasks, the easier they are to complete and the more you will get done.

It's easy to build momentum and reach a flow state when you can tick off small tasks and see rapid accomplishment.

Use Tatask on your new tab page to stay on track on achieve more. 

Tatask includes all the features you need to organise your entire life:
- Infinite subtasks
- Customisable sorting, including drag and drop
- Progress tracking
- Tags
- Both 1 off and recurring due dates
- Powerful search
- Real-time cross platform sync
- Beautiful themes and customisation options.
- Filtering

Tatask is already the best way to manage your tasks and we're making it better all the time!
